ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the reason that the
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the reason that the study treatment was not taken?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Indicate why the study treatment was not taken.

ReferenceDocuments.name: SUPPEC.QVAL
ReferenceDocuments.description: This information could be submitted in a SUPPEC dataset as the value of SUPPEC.QVAL where SUPPEC.QNAM = "ECREASOC" and SUPPEC.QLABEL ="Reason for Occur Value". Refer to the current SDTM and SDTMIG for instructions on placement of non-standard variables in SDTM domains.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The reason the study treatment was not taken may be chosen from a sponsor-defined codelist (e.g., SUBJECT MISTAKE, SUBJECT REFUSED, etc.) or entered as free text. When --REASOC is used, --OCCUR must also be populated in the SDTM dataset with a value of "N".

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Please provide reason why lymphodepletion chemotherapy was not completed?
